thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York Long Island City / Manhattan View - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Solid base in NYC
thread.title_full: Solid base in NYC - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York Long Island City / Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NY008
title: Solid base in NYC
text:
- next to several subway lines
-12 minutes from Grand Central
- Very well run and maintained
- Friendly, helpful staff
- Comfortable, quiet sleep
- good room size
- convenient access to NYC airports
Special thanks to Stephen Cumberbaten, who welcomed us around noon on February 25, for his sincere hospitality and winner attitude.
